        Description copied from interface: Bet

        Specified by:

      • getOutcome

        public int getOutcome​(BetResult result)
        Description copied from interface: Bet

        Returns the outcome of the bet; i.e. the amount won or lost as a result of the bet.

        This overloaded version of the method can be supplied a BetResult parameter meaning it can be called prior to the bet being finalised to show the amount which may be won or lost by the bet. The returned amount shall the same as defined by Bet.getOutcome()
        Specified by:
        getOutcome in interface Bet
        Parameters:
        result - the BetResult to base the outcome.
        Returns:
        0 or a negative or positive value indicating the amount won or lost by the based on the supplied BetResult

      • getOutcome

        public int getOutcome()
        Description copied from interface: Bet

        Returns the outcome of the bet; i.e. the amount won or lost as a result of the bet.

        If this method is called prior to the bet being finalised then it should return 0, otherwise is should return a negative value for a loss and a positive value for a win, both of which should be bases on the bet amount and the bet multiplier. A draw should return 0.
        Specified by:
        getOutcome in interface Bet
        Returns:
        0 or a negative or positive value indicating the amount won or lost by the finalised bet.

      • finaliseBet

        public abstract BetResult finaliseBet​(Hand houseHand)
        Description copied from interface: Bet
        Finalises a bet based on the supplied house hand and returns a BetResult to indicate the result of the bet. This result should also be stored in the bet for later use
        Specified by:
        finaliseBet in interface Bet
        Parameters:
        houseHand - the hand that was dealt to the house used to finalise the bet
        Returns:
        the result of the bet
        See Also:
        BetResult, Bet.getResult(), Bet.getOutcome()

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(Bet bet)
        Description copied from interface: Bet
        Override Comparable.compareTo(Object) Compares this Bet with the supplied Bet for order. Returns a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this Bet value is less than, equal to, or greater than the supplied Bet.

        Hint: It's just some very simple maths to get the return value.

        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Bet
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Bet>
        Returns:
        a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this Bet value is less than, equal to, or greater than the Bet value.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Description copied from interface: Bet
        Override Object.toString(). Generates a string representing the bet as seen in the output trace. The following are examples of such strings (with the first being supplied by @link Bet.NO_BET
        • No Bet
        • Score Bet for 100
        • Suit Bet for 200 on Clubs
        Specified by:
        toString in interface Bet
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a string representing the bet as seen in the output trace
